chunks.text:
From: Charisse Selby <Charisse.Selby-c@dham.ae> 
Sent: Tuesday, 22 July 2025 4:17 PM
Cc: Nino Bola <Nino.Bola@dham.ae>; Meenakshi Mani <Meenakshi.Mani@dham.ae>
Subject: Nakheel Mall – Operational Documents Compliance 
Importance: High

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Classification: Public

 

Dear Valued Tenants,

 

Greetings from Nakheel Mall Management, 

 

We would like to take this opportunity to remind you of the importance of submitting the required Operational documents for your unit. These documents are essential for ensuring the smooth and compliant operation of your business within Nakheel Mall. 

Please find below the list of required documents for your reference:

 

F&B/Restaurants/Supermarkets

Retail/Non-F&B

Trade License

LPG/SNG Maintenance Contract

Trade License

Fire Fighting Maintenance Contract

Kitchen Extract Duct Cleaning Contract

Fire Fighting Maintenance Contract

Fire Fighting DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Pest Control Maintenance Contract 

Fire Fighting DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Fire Alarm Maintenance Contract

Ecological System

Fire Alarm Maintenance Contract

Fire Alarm DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Grease Trap Maintenance Contract

Fire Alarm DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Insurance (Property All Risk)

Basic Food Safety Certificate/PIC

chunks.text:
Fire Alarm Maintenance Contract

Fire Alarm DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Grease Trap Maintenance Contract

Fire Alarm DCD Approved Maintenance Contract

Insurance (Property All Risk)

Basic Food Safety Certificate/PIC 

Insurance (Property All Risk)

Insurance (Third Party Liability) 

Alcohol Certificate (if required)

Insurance (Third Party Liability) 

Insurance (Workman Compensation)

Sisha Certificate (if required)

Insurance (Workman Compensation)

Insurance (Product Liability, Loss or Damage) 

 

Insurance (Product Liability, Loss or Damage) - Optional 

 

 

Pest Control Maintenance Contract 

 

If you have not yet submitted these documents, we kindly request that you send them via email to Charisse Selby at charisse.selby-c@dham.ae <mailto:charisse.selby-c@dham.ae>   on or before 30-Jul-2025.  

 

Please be advised that a penalty will be imposed on tenants who fail to submit the required documents or have expired documents. Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out Operations Duty Manager – 050 912 1394.

Please disregard this email if you already submitted. 

 

Thank you for your cooperation.

 

    

 

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/FThyC7WQKc9ELD9C8fZio0Pfv?domain=dubaiholding.com/> 

Charisse Selby

Office Assistant

T.

800 DHAM

M.
